DOC.detailed_description: This study 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial cytidine-5'-diphosphate choline ( CDP-choline ) amphetamine-type stimulants-using adolescent . Multi-level assessment perform determine whether CDP-choline administration cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) , compare placebo administration CBT , 1 ) repair ATS-induced neural cell damage target brain region , 2 ) improve cognitive deficit normalize relevant target neural circuit , 3 ) reduce ATS-taking behavior ATS-using adolescent .
